### 
```
// http
const http = require('http');
// createServerHTTPHTTP
http.createServer(function(req,res) {
/**
 *  req:res:
 *  200text/html
 *  utf-8
 *  endHTMl
 */
    res.writeHead(200,('Content-Type':'text-html'));
    res.write('<head><meta charset="utf-8"/></head>')
    res.end('hello word')
}).listen(8081);

```
